thread.title: BRIEF-Hangzhou CNCR-IT to acquire firm for 660 mln yuan via cash, share issue
thread.title_full: BRIEF-Hangzhou CNCR-IT to acquire firm for 660 mln yuan via cash, share issue | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: BRIEF-Hangzhou CNCR-IT to acquire firm for 660 mln yuan via cash, share issue
text:
Sept 29 Hangzhou CNCR-IT Co Ltd
* Says plans to acquire technology firm for 660 million yuan ($103.74 million) via cash, share issue
* Says plans to raise up to 250 million yuan in private placement of shares to fund acquisition
Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/1FEOsdr
Further company coverage: ($1 = 6.3621 Chinese yuan renminbi) (Reporting by Hong Kong and Singapore newsrooms)
